translated: Apramāṇābha, Parīttābha, Apramāṇābha, Ābhāsvara, Parīttaśubha, Apramāṇaśubha, Śubhakṛtsna, Anabhraka, Puṇyaprasava, Bṛhatphala, Asaṃjñisattva, Avṛha, Atapa,🔽

original: legs mthong dang / rab lta dang / 'og min dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'o //
analyzed: legs mthong dang / rab lta dang / 'og min dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'o //
translated: the gods of the realm of the first concentration, the gods of the realm of the second concentration, the gods of the realm of the third concentration, the gods of the realm of the fourth concentration, the gods of the realm of infinite space, the gods of the realm of infinite consciousness, the gods of the realm of nothing-at-all, and the gods of the realm of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: 'bras bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas sems can de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas sems can de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
translated: The result is that the bodhisattva mahāsattva, having attained omniscience, establishes those beings in the result of stream enterer, in the result of once-returner, in the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la rab tu 'god pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid la brten zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas sems can thams cad la 'bras bus brjid par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la rab tu 'god pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid la brten zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas sems can thams cad la 'bras bus brjid par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: and they establish them in the fruit of a stream-enterer, in the fruit of a once-returner, in the fruit of a non-returner, in arhatship, in individual enlightenment, and in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de la gang gis yon phul ba de dag kyang rim gyis 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la gang gis yon phul ba de dag kyang rim gyis 'di lta ste /
translated: Those who have given gifts to them will gradually,

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
translated: through the Śrāvaka Vehicle,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
translated: the Pratyekabuddha Vehicle,

original: theg pa chen po'am /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'am /
translated: or the Great Vehicle,

original: theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar @150b 'gyur yang de la sems can du'ang mi 'dogs /
analyzed: theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar @150b 'gyur yang de la sems can du'ang mi 'dogs /
translated: attain final nirvāṇa and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sems can du gdags pa'ang med par sems can de dag kyang sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'grel pa ste /🔽rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang gang gi don du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sems can nam sems can du gdags pa gang
analyzed: sems can du gdags pa'ang med par sems can de dag kyang sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'grel pa ste / rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang gang gi don du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sems can nam sems can du gdags pa gang
translated: and there is no designation of a sentient being, and those sentient beings are also liberated from the apprehension of a sentient being.

original: yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang mi dmigs so //
translated: “Thus, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not apprehend any sentient being or designation of a sentient being at all, thinking, ‘For the sake of that one I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should train in that way.”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti then said,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: “Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings should be known as tathāgatas.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Blessed One, it is because all the hells are cut off in dependence on bodhisattva great beings.

original: byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: all animal births, all worlds of Yama, all unfortunate destinies will be cut off.

original: mi khom pa dang / ngan song thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //🔽dbul po thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi khom pa dang / ngan song thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro // dbul po thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: all unfavorable conditions and all unfortunate rebirths will be cut off.🔽all poverty will be cut off.

original: lam gyi rgyud dma' ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rgyud dma' ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: all low-lying destinies will be cut off.

original: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: all desire realms will be cut off.

original: gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: all form realms will be cut off.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: all formless realms will be cut off.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Subhūti, a bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known as a tathāgata.

original: rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po med na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'gyur /🔽rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po med na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'gyur / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
translated: Subhuti: If, as you say, the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix and the guide of the Tathagatas, then the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix and the guide of the Pratyekabuddhas.🔽Subhuti: If, as you say, the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix and the guide of the Pratyekabuddhas, then the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix and the guide of the Arhats.

original: dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur /🔽sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur / sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur /
translated: Subhuti: If, as you say, the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix and the guide of the Arhats, then the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix and the guide of the Streamwinners.

original: byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad @151a * //🔽kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad @151a * // kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur /
translated: Subhuti: If, as you say, the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix and the guide of the Streamwinners, then the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix and the guide of all beings.

original: mi khom pa thams cad dang dbul po thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mi khom pa thams cad dang dbul po thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur /
translated: Subhuti: If, as you say, the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix and the guide of all beings, then the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix and the guide of all the dharmas.🔽Subhuti: If, as you say, the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix and the guide of all the dharmas, then the perfection of wisdom is the genetrix and the guide of the unconditioned dharmas.

original: 'gro ba dman pa thams cad rgyun chad par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gro ba dman pa thams cad rgyun chad par mi 'gyur /
translated: all the lower destinies will not be cut off;

original: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur /
translated: all the desire realms will not be cut off;

original: gzugs kyi khams thams cad dang / gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams thams cad dang / gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: all the form realms and all the formless realms will not be cut off.

original: rab 'byor de bas na gang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bas na gang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Subhūti, therefore, the one who says, ‘This bodhisattva great being should be known as a tathāgata,’

original: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
translated: Subhūti, it is so,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just as you have said.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, this bodhisattva great being should be known as a tathāgata.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa thams cad du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs su gdags pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa thams cad du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs su gdags pa dang /
translated: the suchness by which the pratyekabuddhas are designated, the suchness by which all the noble ones are designated, the suchness by which form is designated,

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /
translated: the suchness by which feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are designated, the suchness by which the sense fields, elements, and dependent origination are designated, the suchness by which all the perfections,

original: stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
translated: emptiness, the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions,🔽the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors of liberation,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the higher cognitions, the meditative stabilities,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du gdags pa dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du gdags pa dang /
translated: and the dhāraṇī gateways, and the suchness on the basis of which the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are designated.

original: de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi @151b bar du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi bar du gdags pa de dag thams cad kyang de kho na bzhin te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi @151b bar du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi bar du gdags pa de dag thams cad kyang de kho na bzhin te /
translated: The suchness by which the knowledge of all aspects is designated, up to the suchness by which the compounded element and the uncompounded element are designated, all those are just that.

original: de bas na de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called suchness.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid de la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid de la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pas /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva, having trained in that suchness, attains the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Therefore, he is called a tathāgata.

original: rab 'byor rnam grangs des na de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas te /
analyzed: rab 'byor rnam grangs des na de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas te /
translated: Subhūti, by this one of many explanations, having taken suchness as a measure,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva should be known as a tathāgata.

original: rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste /
translated: In this way, Subhūti, should the bodhisattva great beings train in the perfection of wisdom that is suchness.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la slob bo ;
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la slob bo ;
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings, having trained in the perfection of wisdom that is suchness, train in the suchness of all phenomena.

original: / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la bslabs shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la bslabs shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Having trained in the suchness of all phenomena, they perfect the suchness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du gyur pa thob par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas shing chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du gyur pa thob par byed do //
translated: Having perfected the suchness of all phenomena, they attain mastery of the suchness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du gyur pa thob par byas shing sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du gyur pa thob par byas shing sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par byed do //
translated: Having attained mastery of the suchness of all phenomena, they become skilled in the faculties of all sentient beings.

original: dbang po la mkhas par byas shing dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par byed do //
analyzed: dbang po la mkhas par byas shing dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par byed do //
translated: Having become skilled in the faculties, he becomes skilled in perfecting the faculties.

original: dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par byas shing sems can rnams kyi las rang gis byas pa shes par byed do //
analyzed: dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par byas shing sems can rnams kyi las rang gis byas pa shes par byed do //
translated: Having become skilled in perfecting the faculties, he causes sentient beings to understand their own actions.

original: sems can rnams kyi rang gi las shes par byas shing smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi rang gi las shes par byas shing smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Having caused sentient beings to understand their own actions, he perfects the wisdom of aspiration.

original: smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byed do //
analyzed: smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byed do //
translated: Having perfected the wisdom of aspiration, he purifies wisdom in the three times.

original: dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byas shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
analyzed: dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byas shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
translated: Having purified wisdom in the three times, he benefits sentient beings by engaging in the conduct of a bodhisattva.

original: sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byad do //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byad do //
translated: While benefiting sentient beings, he purifies the buddha realms.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//
translated: having purified a buddhafield, they attain the knowledge of all modes.

original: @152a * // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
analyzed: @152a * // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
translated: Having attained the knowledge of all modes, they set rolling the wheel of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do //

translated: The stages of seeing arise from the bodhisattva.

original: mthong ba'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no //
translated: Those who have arisen from the stage of seeing are not the bodhisattva mahāsattvas.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi / gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad bsrabs pa'i sa
